name: Jump or Crush
description:
Run! Jump! Crush! High quality modern retro graphic!

The big box needs to jump over small box to keep them safe!! Tap on the left or right side to make box jump!

The boxes will run faster and faster. Watch out! The game ends if big box and small box collision with each other.

Features:

- Easy to Play but Hard to Master
- Simple and addictive gameplay!
- High quality modern retro graphic!
